short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab displays cover art from your playlist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every time you open a new tab you'll see a random song from a playlist you select. 

I strongly suggest choosing a playlist like "Discovery Weekly" or "Release Radar" for a great way to discover new music!

Features:
 • Click cover art to play preview of song
 • Click Song title or Artist to open in Spotify
 • 'Auto Play' for song previews (found in settings)
 • Dark Mode
